name: Wandering Haze
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 11 (2d4+6) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) acid.

actions.name: Sheath of Chaos
actions.desc: Wraps its cloudy form tighter around those within it. Each creature in the wandering haze's space: 27 (6d8) psychic and is disoriented until end of its next turn as its mind fills with gibbering terrors of chaos that created haze's form (DC 17 Wis half damage and not disoriented). When a disoriented creature moves it moves in a random direction.

actions.name: Acidic Cloudburst (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Releases a deluge of acid. Each creature within 10 ft. of it: 35 (10d6) acid and speed halved 1 min (DC 17 Dex half damage and speed not reduced). A creature with halved speed can make a DC 17 Con save at the end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Acidic Fog
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn in the wandering haze's space takes 7 (2d6) acid.

special_abilities.name: Cloud Form
special_abilities.desc: Can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide with o squeezing and can enter a hostile creature's space and vice versa. The haze's space is heavily obscured.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from ordinary cloud or fog bank.
